name: General Knowledge. Easy
description: You will be presented with various questions from general knowledge. You will need to select 1 answer for every question. Each correct answer will give you 1 point. The timing for this test is not set, take all the time you need. Good Luck.

questions.q: In which Italian city can you find the Colosseum?
What is the boiling point temperature (water)?
Which fruit is associated with Isaac Newton?
What is the largest canyon in the world?
In which museum can you find Leonardo Da Vinci’s Mona Lisa?
Which one of the following scientists is known for his contributions to the science of evolution?
Which one of the following actors did not play James Bond?
In which city can you find the Prado Museum?
What is the largest active volcano in the world?
